transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan boliye.
Customer: Hello. Ji sir, aawaz aa rahi hai?
Executive: Haan, haan, ye boliye.
Customer: Ji sir, abhi baat kar rahi thi main. Sir, kal maine call kiya tha aapko, toh aap bol rahe the na ki aap log hafte ki 10 lead bhej rahe ho, baaki ki saath mein bhej rahe ho.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan, toh maine check ki thi aapki. Toh aapko jo per day ki eight milti hai na, woh aapko mil rahi hai aur jo hafte wali 10 milti hai, woh bhi mil rahi hai.
Executive: Ji agar aapko dekhna matlab check karna hai apna buylead balance toh main aapko bata sakti hu.
Customer: Lead to aami tinte paachchhi. Aar sapte dashta to lead o paachchhi. Mane kinte pari jeta.
Executive: Chalo koi baat nahi.
Customer: Ota lead guloke niye korbi na. Lead niye korli phone number ta ese gele kintu lead ta kete nichche.
Executive: Ota onno bhabe dekhte hoy.
Customer: Aar kichu kotha royechhe na kichu kotha bolben aani?
Executive: Ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says leads are being deducted.



Resolution:

- Executive says weekly and daily leads are being sent.
- Executive offered to check buylead balance.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, balance
